author: Gaurang Chauhan
title: Did you know the original Tamma Tamma Loge is a copy of this song – watch video

persons.name: mujhe kuch sunai nahi de raha

text:
Varun Dhawan in Judwaa 2 and other doubles roles in Bollywood that blew our minds 
Varun Dhawan -Alia Bhatt starrer song, Tamma Tamma Again has released and it has become the talk of the town. The song has received positive reviews from fans and followers. One thing that many are loving about this revisited version or ‘tribute’, as Varun and Alia like to call it is the fact that it retained the voices of original singers; Bappi Lahiri and Anuradha Paudwal. Also the hook step and the hook tune of Tamma Tamma Loge is still afresh in people’s mind that helped the song become an instant hit among the fans even today. But did you know, the foottapping tune of the original ‘Tamma Tamma Loge’ was a copy hit 1988 single Mori Kanté’s Tama. For all those who wondered why Tamma Tamma Loge from Thanedaar and Jumma Chumma De De from Hum sounded similar? Well that’s becasue both the songs were a copy of this french track by Mori Kanté. The track was an instant hit upon its release. The hook line of the song Tam Tama lobe was lifted and turned into Tamma Tamma Loge. And that’s why the words Tamma Tamma Loge doesn’t make sense. Looks like Bappi Lahiri got little too much inspired. Also read: Varun Dhawan royally ignores a question on Govinda’s controversial statements, says, “Mujhe Kuch Sunai Nahi De Raha! “ 
Check out the Tamma Tamma Loge below: 
And now check out the original version i.e Mori Kanté’s Tama: 

Coming back to the latest version of the song in Badrinath Ki Dulhania ‘s Tamma Tamma Again, the very skillfully retains the charm of the original Sanjay Dutt-Madhuri Dixit starrer and the song very smartly uses the, now viral, mannequin challenge and that makes it the perfect blend of 90s and the internet age. 
Badrinath Ki Dulhania is up for a March 10 release, is a sequel to Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania. The film stars Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt in their third film together, after Student Of The Year and Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania.  45 pm Topics:
